name: Mosquito (itch) (jinxedbyte, democore)
description:
Mosquito

Contribution to Trijam #149 - Theme: Flipped

You are the last mosquito on earth in a lab. The population of mosquitos on earth has to be restored. Make your way out of the lab and avoid the electric traps by flipping the switches.

Controls

Click on the switches to flip them and thereby control the lights that attract the mosquito.

Assets
